New Details and Big Features Coming in BG3 Patch 8

BG3 Patch 8 Adds NEW Subclasses

Patch 8 is set to revolutionize how you engage with your favorite class by introducing a brand-new subclass for each of the current Classes in Baldur's Gate 3 (BG3).
